# r-avatar

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                       | Type                                                       | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `alt`    | `alt`     | Alt text for image                                                | `string`                                                   | `''`        |
| `fit`    | `fit`     | How the image fits its container                                  | `"contain" \| "cover" \| "fill" \| "none" \| "scale-down"` | `'cover'`   |
| `icon`   | `icon`    | Icon to display (when no image or slot content)                   | `string`                                                   | `undefined` |
| `shape`  | `shape`   | Avatar shape                                                      | `"circle" \| "square"`                                     | `'circle'`  |
| `size`   | `size`    | Avatar size - can be 'large', 'default', 'small' or a number (px) | `"default" \| "large" \| "small" \| number`                | `'default'` |
| `src`    | `src`     | Image source URL                                                  | `string`                                                   | `undefined` |
| `srcSet` | `src-set` | Native srcset attribute for responsive images                     | `string`                                                   | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event   | Description                      | Type                 |
| ------- | -------------------------------- | -------------------- |
| `error` | Emitted when image fails to load | `CustomEvent<Event>` |
